title: Study of thermodynamic, transport and volumetric properties of nanofluids containing ZrO2 nanoparticles in polypropylene glycol, polyvinyl pyrrolidone and water
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33471-33488
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05886K, Paper

Nasrin Jebreili, Elaheh Janbezar, Mohammed Taghi Zafarani-Moattar, Hemayat Shekaari, Behrang Golmohammadi
Zirconium dioxide (ZrO2) aqueous nanofluid has been stabilized using PPG and PVP mixture and confirmed with thermophysical properties study and spectroscopic analysis.
